data.scheme_name: Gujarat Semiconductor Policy 2022 - 2027 - Subsidy on land procurement - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 75% of subsidy on the first 200 Acres of land required for a FAB project.
data.eligibility:
Any Company / consortia / joint venture which has applied under the following schemes to set up operations in Gujarat: 
Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Display Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Compound Semiconductors / Silicon Photonics / Sensors Fab and Semiconductor Assembly, Testing, Marking and Packaging (ATMP) / OSAT facilities
data.conditions:
1. The subsidy on land shall be provided only to projects being set up in Dholera Special Investment Region. 
  2. However, the State Government reserves the right to provide subsidy, to projects being setup at any other location in Gujarat.
  3. The subsidies on land procurement provided for in this policy will be available only on the land allotted by DSIRDA or by the Government or any of its agencies.
data.beneficiaries:
Any Company / consortia / joint venture which has applied under the following schemes to set up operations in Gujarat: 
Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Display Fabs in India
Scheme for setting up of Compound Semiconductors / Silicon Photonics / Sensors Fab and Semiconductor Assembly, Testing, Marking and Packaging (ATMP) / OSAT facilities
data.prerequisites:
1. The subsidy on land shall be provided only to projects being set up in Dholera Special Investment Region. 
  2. However, the State Government reserves the right to provide subsidy, to projects being setup at any other location in Gujarat. 
  3. The subsidies on land procurement provided for in this policy will be available only on the land allotted by DSIRDA or by the Government or any of its agencies. Projects approved under Design Linked Incentive Scheme of Government of India will not be eligible for availing benefits under this policy.
data.context:
1. The Government of Gujarat is committed towards the vision of Government of India in making India as the next global hub of semiconductor and display manufacturing sector. 
  2. The Gujarat Semiconductor Policy (2022-27) will facilitate the eligible projects for land allotment, enable expedited process approvals, ready access to utilities such as power, water, gas and other industrial infrastructure besides the fiscal incentive support package under this policy.
data.objective: Objective of the scheme is to make Gujarat a pioneer State in developing the Indian ESDM ecosystem by facilitating effective and timely execution of the eligible projects for setting up of a robust semiconductor and Display Fab Ecosystem, and thereby creating more employment giving boost to socio-economic development of the State.
data.description: Scheme provide 75% of subsidy on the first 200 Acres of land required for a FAB project and additional 50% subsidy on land required for the FAB project or upstream / downstream ecosystem.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicant can apply on the below mentioned portal -
https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/login
data.funding_facilitator: Department of Science and Technology, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
Eligible Capital Expenditure' means the following: 

  1. Eligible Capital Expenditure shall be limited to capital expenditure / investment incurred on building, plant, machinery, clean rooms, equipment, and associated utilities (including used / second hand / refurbished) as well as tools, dies, moulds, jigs, fixtures (including parts, accessories, components, and spares thereof) of the same, used in the manufacturing process eligible under the Scheme. 
  2. It shall also include expenditure on packaging, freight / transport, insurance, and erection and commissioning of the plant, machinery, equipment, and associated utilities. Associated utilities would include captive power and effluent treatment plants, essential equipment required in operations areas such as clean rooms, air curtains, temperature and air quality control systems, compressed air, water and power supply, and control systems etc. 
  3. Associated utilities would also include IT and ITES infrastructure related to manufacturing including servers, software, and ERP solutions.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission , Department of Science & Technology, Government of Gujarat , Block No. 11, 9th Floor, Udyog Bhavan, Gandhinagar-382010
Ph. No. : 079-232-52197
Email ID : mnbtm7@gujarat.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries -  Private Limited Company, Public Company, Others - Gujarat - All MSMEs, All Non - MSMEs
